name: Brave
description: Challenges or danger, this character fears nothing.

name: Craven
description: This character does not enjoy being challenged, or scared, at all.

name: Calm
description: This character takes things in stride, leading a slow-paced life.

name: Wrathful
description: This character is quick to anger and fury.

name: Chaste
description: This character dislikes intimate contact, avoiding the temptations of the flesh.

name: Lustful
description: Carnal desires burn hot in this character's core.

name: Content
description: What they already have, be it much or little, is enough for this character.

name: Ambitious
description: This character knows what they want, and they are not afraid to try and get it.

name: Diligent
description: This character does not shy away from hard work.

name: Lazy
description: The easiest road in life is the road most taken by this character.

name: Fickle
description: This character changes their mind more often than not, making them hard to predict.

name: Stubborn
description: This character does not back down for anything.

name: Forgiving
description: This character is quick to move on from most things.

name: Vengeful
description: This character is slow to forget a slight or someone who does them wrong.

name: Generous
description: Acts of benevolence and charity are no strangers to this character.

name: Greedy
description: This character keeps a tight grip on their purse and is always looking for ways to engorge it.

name: Gregarious
description: This character enjoys spending time with other people.

name: Shy
description: This character prefers to avoid interacting with other people.

name: Honest
description: This character values truth and sincerity highly.

name: Deceitful
description: To lie and deceive is in this character's nature.

name: Humble
description: This character does not ask for much in life.

name: Arrogant
description: This character has no problem with their sense of worth.

name: Just
description: This character has a strong sense of justice.

name: Arbitrary
description: This character does their own thing and has little regard for others.

name: Patient
description: To wait and bide their time is a specialty of this character.

name: Impatient
description: This character thinks that most things should happen fast: ideally they should happen now!

name: Temperate
description: According to this character, it's best to enjoy things in moderation.

name: Gluttonous
description: This character scoffs at moderation; they want it all!

name: Trusting
description: This character is quick to place their faith in others.

name: Paranoid
description: This character sees enemies in every shadow.

name: Zealous
description: Religious conviction burns bright at the center of this character.

name: Cynical
description: This character trusts the self-interest of others above all else.

name: Compassionate
description: Both merciful and sympathetic, this character is warmhearted.

name: Callous
description: Being called both heartless and cold-blooded, this character is indifferent to most.

name: Sadistic
description: Few things bring this character as much joy as the suffering of others.
